Code search + intelligence

Sourcegraph is a fast, solid, full-featured code search and navigation engine. Get cross-repository code search plus code intelligence (tooltips, jump to definition, symbol search) on all public code and on your private code. Either on Sourcegraph.com or code hosted on your own servers.

Cross repository code search
Search across all public and your private code.
Code intelligence
Jump to a GitHub repository to see how it works.
Enterprise code intelligence
Scalable code search and intelligence engine for large teams.
More

Code search

Speed

It's super fast

Always up-to-date

No indexing, live search on your current code

Everywhere

Use our API or CLI to put search in your workflow

Code intelligence

View all references

See everywhere a functino or package is used, and who's using it.

View the authors of any file

See blame information inline with a simple toggle.

Search by symbol

Quickly jump to a variable or function anywhere in a repository.
